name: Pillow Valley (Manuel Suarez, rubinoffsama, Teddy, Nicolás Oliver)
name_original: Pillow Valley (Manuel Suarez, rubinoffsama, Teddy, Nicolás Oliver)
description:
You have 5 minutes to enjoy your power nap.

Clocks will try to wake up you up! Villagers will go to your community and create slingshots to throw pillows and stop them!

Controls

A/D - Move the slings

Space - Shoot the pillow

Manuel Suarez / Diego Debenedetti - Programming 

Alan Rubinoff / Nicolas Oliver - Art
